meta.name: description
meta.content: Home page for the City of Bethlehem, PA

meta.name: viewport

ul.class: icon-nav desktop4 laptop5 midsize7 no-mobile flexbox

div.class: nav-container desktop8 laptop8 midsize10 tablet12 phone12

section.p: Bethlehem is a city of 75,000 people in eastern Pennsylvania – a city known for its rich colonial and industrial history. Today Bethlehem is experiencing an economic and cultural renaissance promising a future as bright as the city’s past.

a.p: Now Hiring Skate Guards and Cashiers
CALL FOR ARTIST ENTRIES - The South Bethlehem Gateway Art Project
End of Season Pool and Splash Park Schedule

img.alt: Article City of Bethlehem Trick or Treat Night

div.h1: City of Bethlehem Trick or Treat Night
div.p: Get your costumes ready and join us for our annual "Trick or Treat" night throughout the streets of Bethlehem.
City of Bethlehem Trick or Treat Night

img.alt: Article City of Bethlehem 103rd Annual Halloween Parade

div.h1: City of Bethlehem 103rd Annual Halloween Parade
div.p: Join us for a Bethlehem tradition!
City of Bethlehem 103rd Annual Halloween Parade

img.alt: Article Volleyball Nights at Fairview Park

div.p: Join us on Wednesday nights at Fairview Park for open volleyball.

img.alt: Article Music in the Parks Concert Series

div.h1: Music in the Parks Concert Series
div.p: Join us at the Rose Garden, South Bethlehem Greenway, and Elmwood Park for some great live music!
Music in the Parks Concert Series
